name: 19.23h
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1

comment: Theorem 19.23 of [Margaris] p. 90. See ~ 19.23 . (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 1-Jan-2018.)
